website_summaries.verdict: A simple USB controller meant for operating DJ software on a computer.
pros: All-in-one controller replicates the experience of most analog DJ mixers
Provides easy control over a variety of digital audio workstation software
Features touch-sensitive metal jog wheels, 16 backlit rubber trigger pads, and multi-function touchstrip
High-quality components, knobs, and buttons make it extremely durable
cons: Does not have any audio inputs and outputs

customer_reviews.title: It's alright
customer_reviews.text: After you buy this you are going to get hitt-up for another $100 for software. The software that comes with it, you have to buy to use the controller after 30 days.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Schwartz

customer_reviews.title: BUY but use your own music and not its very limited software.
customer_reviews.text: Very limited in the software side for what it says comes with it. HIGHLY ADVISE you have plans using this with your own music you own or have on your compute. The music unlimited is very limited and all mixes Video now is very limited too in the same aspect Use your own software and use your own audio content and this is not such a bad purchase. Wish it was noted mainly though about the limited options in the software it gives you to use.
customer_reviews.author: Munchnplay

customer_reviews.title: ... DJ iO2 | USB DJ Audio Interface and I love it. All I need now is a nice ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this aNumark Mixtrack 3 | All-in-one Controller purchased along with a Numark DJ iO2 | USB DJ Audio Interface and I love it. All I need now is a nice set of power ammped speakers and I'm good to go to do small events such as birthday parties and community events. Great price too!
customer_reviews.author: ABeltran

customer_reviews.title: Lame-O
customer_reviews.text: Computer interface sucks (don't try connecting this to a computer with current OSX- it's not supported) The hardware is OK, but without effective software, it's pointless. I returned it and decided to go back to my Pioneer set-up... quality is expensive and this is cheap plastic crap with hidden costs in the software. I've been a DJ and sound engineer for 20 years... spend the extra money and move away from Numark junk.
customer_reviews.author: T. DeJarlais

customer_reviews.title: This controller is very simple and is still great for mixing and spinning
customer_reviews.text: WOW! I bought this as a beginner looking to mix through virtual dj. This controller is very simple and is still great for mixing and spinning. One downside to look at is that there is no headphone cable in the front like the other but you can still listen through the computer output.
customer_reviews.author: Sam Miller

customer_reviews.title: Best DJ Controler
customer_reviews.text: I just bought Thia yester and the shipping was fast and as soon as I open and plug in my laptop wow I started mixing and love the colorful button when you press on it also the loop match with the best of the song I would recommend buying this product to any DJ out there
customer_reviews.author: Alan

customer_reviews.title: Numark controller
customer_reviews.text: Once you get it set up it takes time to use. I'm not sure if they sell this one anymore. There are numark controllers that are easier to use than this one. Your going to want to up grade to the pro soon after playing with this one.
customer_reviews.author: Adam E.

customer_reviews.title: Why?
customer_reviews.text: Not compatible for Serato software which is better and cheaper than virtual DJ once your free trial is up. Either pay 50 dollars more for Mixtrack pro and save money in the long run for upgrading or be stuck with this model and pay double the amount for the current software vs the top competitor . You are better off paying for the cheaper numark which comes with Serato software vs this model which doesn't make since.This is the only model by numark that is not compatible with Serato.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for my son
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my son and he loves it. He says it's the best gift he has ever got in his life. Lol OK son. I'm glad he loves it. And it was a great price for all it does, I shopped around this one seemed like a great starter that he can grow into more which will last longer then having to upgrade right away. You can go to bars and dj with this.
customer_reviews.author: Kasper

customer_reviews.title: Total scam
customer_reviews.text: The "free" software that comes with this product is only free for a trial period of 30 days after which it will hijack the controller and disable it unless you pay a ransom of 300$ effectively making the controller completely useless. You aren't actually buying a controller that will work you are paying for the right to pay them even more money just to use the controller you already paid for. This is an extremely frustrating waste of money. This is a total waste of time and money and I wouldn't recommend it to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Radulovic

customer_reviews.title: Decent
customer_reviews.text: Good buy for in home mixing. Only down fall is no audio output. Best get yourself a splitter for your headphones and stereo.
customer_reviews.author: DJ CTX

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful for beginner DJs
customer_reviews.text: The Mixtrack 3 is a wonderful mixer for new beginners. Despite its low price, the mixer is equipt with most of the functions that would be in a higher end mixer. When connected to your computer, it only takes a fraction of a second to get connected. Although not having an in-built sound card may be a con, it definitely is worth the purchase. (The Mixtrack 3 Pro has a soundcard is a soundcard is a must for some people tho!)
customer_reviews.author: Samyam Dhungel

customer_reviews.title: Useless without program
customer_reviews.text: The item description stated that it comes with a DJ program, however, they neglect to tell you that it is a trial subscription and once the trial ends, the deck is useless. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: MLC

customer_reviews.title: Great for an entry-level controller
customer_reviews.text: Great for an entry-level controller. Got the standard non-pro edition and added an external soundcard + rack and headphones all for the price of the "pro" edition. Will most likely upgrade sometime in the future but for learning the basics of DJing and performing at small parties it works like a charm! I chose to use Mixxx software over Virtual DJ to save some cash as well, and the software has performed beautifully to this point.
customer_reviews.author: Bcanderson1

customer_reviews.title: Nice Numark controller
customer_reviews.text: Nice controller, not what I needed thought because it doesn't have a built in sound card, you need an external sound card. which is fine for those who want to purchase it.
customer_reviews.author: i7Pro

customer_reviews.title: It no longer works without a subscription to VDJ 8 after 30 days.
customer_reviews.text: It worked great and was super fun for a whole 30 days then only worked for 10 min at a time before asking for money. It is currently collecting dust in my closet. Wish I would have read the fine print that said I would have to purchase a monthly subscription or shell out another $100 to use the product I purchased. I will never buy a Numark product again. Does anyone know how to unlock this thing?
customer_reviews.author: Michael Pollock

customer_reviews.title: Let get mixing
customer_reviews.text: I was very hesitant about purchasing for a gift. But it turned out to be Great quality, and my son has spent HOURS mixing music with it. You will not be disappointed with this controller .
customer_reviews.author: Jenny Smith

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed!!
customer_reviews.text: Not happy with the product...reason being the software suppose to be free i followed the the direction on the manual Numark provided the controller worked for 30 days and its not telling me my trial is expired and have to pay for the software please respond ASAP because I take matters like this very seriously when I feel as if I am cheated..I am a DJ by profession and and it made me look bad at a performance please resolve this problem before I take action
customer_reviews.author: Richard Blackman

customer_reviews.title: Good to go
customer_reviews.text: I had the original Mixtrack when it first came out and I really liked it. I have purchased this to see if I have the time and drive to get back into DJ'ing and it has taken over my nights, I cant wait to get home and play music. Everything works just as it did in the past but the new features make it even better. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: James Houston

customer_reviews.title: This is false advertisements
customer_reviews.text: I dislike the fact that in the description I was told that this product can work with serato and it only works with virtual dj
customer_reviews.author: Gideon

customer_reviews.title: A really good product for beginners
customer_reviews.text: A really good product for beginners. It lets you to explore the very basic things about making your own music. The software with it is pretty good too, very easy to use and you don't need too much time till you can figure out how to make your music like a real DJ. It can be used when you throw a home party with friends, and definitely a good way to impress all of them.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Jiang

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: This controller started my DJ career thanks to this I’m doing what I love today, great product very durable and still going after a couple beer stills from rowdy people at gigs
customer_reviews.author: Luis

customer_reviews.title: Great for starting
customer_reviews.text: This is a great controller to start with but make sure you pick up an external USB to Aux adapter so you can cue.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Great set up, but the up graded pro would be better because of the included software upgrade
customer_reviews.author: harvey duke barr

customer_reviews.title: This an awesome unit for a beginner and for the price
customer_reviews.text: This an awesome unit for a beginner and for the price. I just like to mess around, so I'm not super specific on what I'm looking for and also don't want to break my bank.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriel Flores

customer_reviews.title: Headphone
customer_reviews.text: Does not have headphone connections. Most controllers have Makes it difficult to sync and cue music
customer_reviews.author: Leslie S.

customer_reviews.title: Good beginner controller
customer_reviews.text: This is a good beginner DJ Controller. I used it for about a year honing my DJ skills and it hasnt disappointed me. That being said, it is a beginners controller and has limited features.
customer_reviews.author: Michael D

customer_reviews.title: I love it and it is well designed
customer_reviews.text: This product has worked very well over the past year and no issues or lag during use for family gathering. I love it and it is well designed
customer_reviews.author: G.Perez

customer_reviews.title: DJ Board
customer_reviews.text: Yes sir, I'm a happy person. Easy to use, excellent training videos, and lots of options.
customer_reviews.author: Dnice2b

customer_reviews.title: There is no headphone jack, I was aware of this and got a splitter cable.
customer_reviews.text: I am a dubstep and deathstep fan, I had gotten bored of djing on computer. saved and got this. it is a great controller and I use it every day. I but remember to get a soundcard, usb splitter cable, or splittercable with a converter piece if nessesary.
customer_reviews.author: Rachell Getman

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a Christmas gift for My son. He loves this mix track

customer_reviews.title: Great product for a beginner
customer_reviews.text: The controller is great and the sounds and added feature are awesome.

customer_reviews.title: I am truly glad that I made this purchase
customer_reviews.text: This product was purchased as a Christmas gift for my son. He so loves it. I am truly glad that I made this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Ella Yarber

customer_reviews.title: Very nice controller
customer_reviews.text: Very much enjoyed this product it is a awesome starter for beginner DJs
customer_reviews.author: Ronald M.

customer_reviews.title: Luv my Numark Mixtrack 3
customer_reviews.text: I'm old school spinner, this being my first hand at on USB Dj controller-- I love it, now I mix on the fly with all my mp3 downloads!
customer_reviews.author: Juan C. Julien

customer_reviews.title: inMusic Brand Inc is of the places for DJ equipment.
customer_reviews.text: I thought it came with the full software but, over all I love it.

customer_reviews.title: I love this
customer_reviews.text: I like it. If you do not purchase the software it will give you 10 minutes to use it every time you plug it up

customer_reviews.title: A very good first step.
customer_reviews.text: A very good first step into the world of laptops and deejaying, even without the soundcard!
customer_reviews.author: George A. Rowland

customer_reviews.title: This is A W E S  O M E !!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great feel on the jog wheels little delay when doing loops, with VDJ 8, Works flawlessly with Serato

customer_reviews.title: No headphones jack and no RCA output
customer_reviews.text: I bought one on amazon I think it a waste of time and money

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 18-year old son who is new to this whole mixing thing and he says it's "dope," which apparently means he likes it. I'm happy with my purchase. I was even happier about the price.

customer_reviews.title: Easy
customer_reviews.text: Love the product my son is really enjoying it. He says it’s very easy to use.

customer_reviews.title: Training tool
customer_reviews.text: Good for practice at home but i suggest getting a better model if you ever plan on playing outside of your home setup

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Wish it has external audio output for each deck.All in all it is cool

customer_reviews.title: It comes with a Limited Edition license!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I like the controller. However, the Virtual DJ LE is a Limited Edition. It means after 30 days you can no longer use the controller. You will eventually have to buy a Virtual DJ license. I read the reviews and one said that you will be able to use the controller forever. That is not true. Again, it only gives you a 30 day limited edition to use the controller. I will most likely return this item as I do not want to pay the additional $99.00 to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Phil

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: This unit doesn't come with rca connectors.so it made it hard to connect.

customer_reviews.title: Like it

customer_reviews.title: Definitely a nice introduction to
customer_reviews.text: My wife was able to set this up and she has very limited computer skills. Definitely a nice introduction to mixing

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good for start no sound card a problem ! If you buy, take the one with sound card

customer_reviews.title: Great for beginners
customer_reviews.text: Great for beginners. Good quality for the price. Definitely worth the purchase. However my box never came with the special code for the Virtual DJ software so hopefully that doesn't matter to you.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: NUMARK DJ
customer_reviews.text: I have always been impressed with the Numark products. The only reason I returned the item was to spend the extra money and get the MIXTRACK PRO 3. It's just the better item for me

customer_reviews.title: But it's cool and tons of fun
customer_reviews.text: Does what it says. It could benefit from a toggle switch for transforming. And I think I should have got one with bigger discs and a display. But it's cool and tons of fun!

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use great for a beginner I would recommend it to my friends

customer_reviews.title: Definitely a great controller It looks pretty professional as well Price is ...
customer_reviews.text: Definitely a great controller It looks pretty professional as well Price is good

customer_reviews.title: Came 20 minutes after 8:00pm, but amazing product either way!
customer_reviews.text: Just received this product after the "before 8pm" estimated time, so I became over-anxious. This Numark mixtrack 3 handles very well especially considering the price. The jog wheel can be used for scratching or altering the tempo which I found to be very applicable. It is a beginner controller, but has advanced technology. I used to use a Hercules, which did not feel very durable compared to this, and the knobs became loose rather quickly. The mixtrack 3 is holding up very well, and makes dj-ing very easy
customer_reviews.author: BboyGi11s

customer_reviews.title: Limited but a great startup piece
customer_reviews.text: Limited but a great startup piece... was a little more than I expected

customer_reviews.title: The team came without the vdj,

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT. THIS IS A BEGINEER MIXER
customer_reviews.text: This is a "Begineer DJ controller" so why the advanced DJ's are Buying this the advamced DJ's may have a Traktor or a Pioneer controller with In/Out Puts. This controller is USB only because it is a begineer controller. Anyway, if you are a begineer DJ and you need something simple but very good this is your product but, if you're an advanced DJ and you need performance buy a Traktor or a Pioneer. 5 Star
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This controller is great for playing parties and at bars with a medium ...
customer_reviews.text: This controller is great for playing parties and at bars with a medium crowd! You can also record your own mixes!

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly surprised.
customer_reviews.text: Great introduction to using a mixer with Virtual Dj. Wish it had an on off switch but other than that I love it.

customer_reviews.title: Its a perfect controller besides the fact that my slider to go ...
customer_reviews.text: Its a perfect controller besides the fact that my slider to go from track A to track B is a little messed up. Other than that i like it!

customer_reviews.title: Garbage
customer_reviews.text: Crap, crossfader broke within 6 months. Amazon wont take it back and Numark is giving me a hard time with the return. Don't waste your money

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Did not receive the code that's suppose to come with the equipment

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working
customer_reviews.text: Product stopped working after 5 months. Looking to see if it can be returned???

customer_reviews.title: SO MUCH FUN FOR THE $$$
customer_reviews.text: Awesome controller for the price. All you need to start as a beginner DJ. So much fun.

customer_reviews.title: Present for the next Martin Garrix
customer_reviews.text: My nephew is half German and all those European kids want to be the next Martin Garrix or Avici ... who am I to destroy his dream. I got him this for christmas... he says it is amazing... a good first mixer. He is happy I am happy
customer_reviews.author: Seedless Armchair

customer_reviews.title: Does NOT have a HEADPHONE jack
customer_reviews.text: This does not have a sound card. I should have read more of the description, but I did not know they would even sell a $300 Numark without a sound card. For those who don't know what a sound card...you cannot plug a headphone in to the unit and listen to music before playing.
customer_reviews.author: Hollywood

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for what I needed
customer_reviews.text: Worked great. Easy to control. I'm not a pro dj but for corporate events or some dances this works great. It does not have a built in sound card, so you can not do headphone cueing without purchasing one. I bought the Sabrent USB audio interface for under 15 bucks and worked great.
customer_reviews.author: C woj

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product but had to send back due to it ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product but had to send back due to it not fitting inside my odyssey case. I have the original numark mixtrack. And needed a upgrade. But was disappointed that I might need to get a new case.
customer_reviews.author: daryl

customer_reviews.title: Son loves the controller.
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my son. It was easy for him to setup with his laptop and PA system. He seems to like it. Used it for his first DJ gig.
customer_reviews.author: rpl0264 user

customer_reviews.title: Great for beginners
customer_reviews.text: So, as I was preparing for my friends party, he asked me if I knew anyone who could DJ. I didn't know anyone but I did produce music. Djing and producing are very different but I took on the responsibility of Djing his party. Anyway, the mixer itself is very user friendly. There are simple switches for Treble,Bass, etc. The program coming with the mixer is fairly good and very good for beginners. The others packs that come are pretty much useless.
customer_reviews.author: Marcus Ramos

customer_reviews.title: Software killed it..
customer_reviews.text: hate how you have to buy the software that is more then the unit itself. Wish they would of had a program that came with it. would of made this one hell of a deal...

customer_reviews.title: ... yet but I can see it really has some cool and intricate features its like the others but its ...
customer_reviews.text: Using this upgraded numark 3 mixing board I haven't really used it yet but I can see it really has some cool and intricate features its like the others but its more smoother when using the knobs and fader and the many lights are nice let you guys know on my future update of using this thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Derrick Lyles

customer_reviews.title: Additional license purchases are required.
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately additional licenses are required to use it with Virtual DJ. Nevertheless great product and great seller. Thanks

customer_reviews.title: Great Board for the Mobile Dj.
customer_reviews.text: Great Board for the Mobile Dj. Not something you would use to do trance or techno, but great for the Dj who likes real music and not just irritating noise.

customer_reviews.title: We upgraded from a Mark 1 Numark bored. This particular one we use in ourDAWS set ...
customer_reviews.text: We upgraded from a Mark 1 Numark bored. This particular one we use in ourDAWS set up ( digital audio workstation). It seems to work a lot better than the old one. Went in to buy a Mark 3 Pro which has the additional audio out to run the apps off of in the near future and has the same key layout as the Mark 3.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome! It comes with a 30 day trial of ...
customer_reviews.text: Awesome! It comes with a 30 day trial of Virtual DJ7 and still works after the free trial...it is a limited version after the trial period but still works fine. This mixer is way beyond great!! Thank you Numark!!

customer_reviews.title: Controller works fine but...
customer_reviews.text: Controller is now unusable one month after purchase. No license number was provided (either in-box or online) to unlock use of the controller with the provided software. Support tickets not responded to within the stated window (24-72 hours during business days -- still waiting on a response). Complete waste of money.

customer_reviews.title: Love it everything great

Worked good for the first month but there is a problem with the crossfader when you move it to the right. Useless now for certain types of mixing. Has a 30 day return policy and broke 45 days after having it. I use it at home to practice so not even hard on the unit.

customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: You'll have to buy a subscription fee for $100 or else
customer_reviews.text: You'll have to buy a subscription fee for $100 or else you'll only be playing this for 10 mins per session. It is very frustrating to really get the subscription to work, also please note it make not give you any sound on some laptops/computers, neither does it have headphone nor mic jacks. However, after you manage to set it up, it runs like a charm!
customer_reviews.author: zavier

product_meta.title: Numark Mixtrack 3 | All-In-One 2-Deck DJ Controller for Serato DJ Including an Long-Throw Pitch Faders, 5-inch High Resolution Jog Wheels and Virtual DJ LE & Prime Loops Remix Tool Kit
product_meta.description: MINIMUM SYSTEM REQUIREMENTS : Mac : Mac OS X 10.6 mac OS , 10.13 High Sierra , 1.6GHz Intel Core Duo , All Intel i3, i5 and i7 , Processors are supported Screen Resolution : 1024 x 768 , RAM 1GB (minimum) , Available USB 2.0 port Windows : Windows Vista with Service Pack 1, Windows 7 with SP1, Windows 8, Windows 8.1, Windows 10 , 2GHz Intel Core 2 Duo , Available USB 2.0 port
feature_bullets: Usb Controller: Powered by USB connection to computer for home and aspiring DJs
Sound Cord Sold Separately: Requires external audio interface for sound output to headphones and speakers
VIRTUAL DJ LE: Software download included after free controller registration. Please refer the User Guide before use.
Beat Matching: Long, 100mm pitch sliders to keep in perfect sync
Pro Features: Touch-sensitive metal jog wheels, multi-function touchstrip, 16 backlit, rubber trigger pads, volume levels display
